description: The OpenSCAP scanner can be run on the image tree and the remediation can be carried
out during build time. The stage takes the OpenSCAP config as input and then runs the
the utility in chroot to scan and remediate [1] the tree during image at build time.
The stage generates an html report and xml results file both saved to the `data_dir`
directory. It defaults to `/root` if not configured.

data_dir.description: Path to directory where OpenSCAP reports and results should be saved

datastream.description: The path to the data stream file

tailoring.description: The path to the custom tailoring file

arf_results.description: Filename for storing the ARF results file

xml_results.description: Filename for storing the ARF results file (synonym for arf_results)

xccdf_results.description: Filename for storing the XCCDF results file

html_report.description: Filename for saving the final HTML report

verbose_level.description: The verbosity level for the log messages

compress_results.description: Compress ARF and XCCDF results file(s) with xz
